nodes.text: Erika Blythe was a female human miner who was the mother of Bailen and Ronn and the wife of Ottoh Blythe. She and her husband had a homestead on the planet Elphrona. Shortly after the Great Hyperspace Disaster, the family was kidnapped from their home by Nihil raiders, who planned to ransom them to their wealthy relatives that lived in the Core Worlds. Erika and her children were eventually rescued by Jedi from the Elphrona Outpost.
